author: Markus Spring
content:
Andreas, I don't think it's even remotely justified to use 'postcard' in a depreciating sense, therefore I dare to say that I like this shot. I see harmony and beauty as autotelic values responding with certain layers in our soul.

Taking 'postcards', as Ted ranted about, can only become a problem if that is all one can do. But not taking 'postcards' I see as an even bigger problem as this could mean that one isn't able to communicate with ordinary people through pictures any more.

Just my 2c...
